name: Successful Full Payment with Early Bird Bonus
description: Tests the ideal scenario where a user pays the full amount more than 5 days early.
steps: Login to FinClusive app.
Select a credit card with an outstanding amount of 50,000.
Verify the payment due date is 10 days from now.
Enter 50,000 in the 'Amount to Pay' field.
Select UPI as the payment method and complete the transaction.
Navigate to the Rewards summary page.
expected_result: The transaction is successful. The user should receive 500 standard points (50000/100), a 500 point full-payment bonus, and a 200 point early-payment bonus, for a total of 1200 points.

name: Successful Partial Minimum Payment
description: Tests that a user can make a partial payment equal to the minimum required amount.
steps: Login to FinClusive app.
Select a credit card with an outstanding amount of 25,000.
Enter 100 in the 'Amount to Pay' field.
Select Net Banking as the payment method and complete the transaction.
Navigate to the Rewards summary page.
expected_result: The transaction is successful. The user should receive 1 standard reward point (100/100). No full-payment or other bonuses should be applied.

name: Verify Monthly Auto-Pay Bonus
description: Tests that a user with auto-pay enabled receives their passive monthly bonus.
steps: Login with a user who has had Auto-Pay enabled for an entire billing cycle.
Make a standard partial payment of 10,000.
Navigate to the Rewards summary page.
Check the monthly rewards statement.
expected_result: The user should receive 100 standard points for the payment, and the monthly statement should show a separate credit of 100 points for the Auto-Pay bonus.

name: New User Registration and Card Addition
description: Tests the complete end-to-end flow for a new user signing up and adding their first card.
steps: Enter a new 10-digit mobile number.
Submit the 6-digit OTP received.
Set a strong password and a 4-digit PIN.
On the dashboard, navigate to 'Add Card'.
Enter a valid 16-digit card number, name, and future expiry date.
Complete the 1 rupee verification transaction.
expected_result: User account is created successfully, and the new credit card appears in the user's list of managed cards.

name: OTP Required for High Value Payment
description: Tests that the OTP security check is triggered for payments over the 10,000 threshold.
steps: Login to the app.
Select a card and choose to pay a custom amount of 15,000.
Proceed to the payment confirmation screen.
expected_result: The application must prompt the user to enter a 6-digit OTP before the transaction can be completed.

name: Redeem Minimum Points for Cashback
description: Tests the reward redemption functionality at the minimum allowed threshold.
steps: Login with a user who has more than 500 reward points.
Navigate to the 'Redeem Points' section.
Enter 500 points to redeem.
Confirm the redemption.
expected_result: 500 points are deducted from the user's balance, and 5 rupees (500 points / 100) are credited to their wallet balance.

name: Payment Below Minimum Amount is Rejected
description: Tests the input validation for the custom payment amount field.
steps: Login to the app.
Select a card and choose to pay a custom amount.
Enter '99' into the amount field.
Attempt to proceed to the payment screen.
expected_result: The 'Pay Now' button should be disabled, and an error message stating 'Minimum payment amount is 100' should be displayed.
